main.name: George
main.description: I'm an entering (Fall '21) first year graduate CS student at UCLA, actively doing research in NLP under Prof. Jingbo Shang (UCSD). I'm currently a SWE Intern at Convoy, and have worked previously at AMEX and other startups. Additionally, I enjoy gyming, hiking, sports (tennis/table tennis) and gaming (ches/valo). Feel free to reach me at gnpu@g.ucla.edu

education.description: Starting Fall 2021 with a focus on AI
Cum Laude; Societies: Computer Science Student Society, Data Sciene Student Society; Minor: CogSci (ML and Neural Computation)
